meanings.sent1: She enjoyed relacing her sneakers with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent2: He is relacing his old boots to make them look new again.
meanings.sent3: The young girl giggled while relacing her doll's tiny shoes.
meanings.sent4: Relacing the threads of friendship can make the bond stronger.
meanings.sent5: The tailor was relacing the torn dress with precision and care.

meanings.definition: To repair or replace laces on a shoe or piece of clothing.
meanings.sent1: He is relacing his favorite sneakers that got torn.
meanings.sent2: She spent the afternoon relacing her worn-out ballet shoes.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy puppy kept relacing the owner's shoelaces as a playful game.
meanings.sent4: Relacing the hoodie's drawstring made it look brand new.
meanings.sent5: The hiker was relacing his hiking boots before hitting the trail again.
